title: Broken Engagements And Curses - Novel Updates
tags: Dark   Female Protagonist   Magic   Male Yandere   Obsessive Love   Oneshot   R-15

description:
Alicia, a curse-evading mage, was chosen to talk to the cursed third prince, Daryl. As they spent their days together, they became attracted to each other. Alicia tried her best to save him from the curse.

But their unforgivable love for each other soon became twisted.>
